name: Small Business 1-on-1 Training Program
description: The SF LGBT Center Small Business 1-on-1 Training Program is a 6-session training program where we will work with you on a 1-on-1 basis to help you start or develop your business. The program will cover all aspects of creating and running a business, which includes marketing and business development, business finance, entity formation, strategic planning, organizational planning, and operational planning. This program is currently available to individuals and businesses in San Francisco. Through
